languages.text: {n}Дэгген ухмыляется.{/n} "Когда-то меня звали Запальщик. Он — Канистра, я — Запальщик... хорошие были времена!"
{n}Daggen smirks.{/n} "They used to call me Torch. He's Jerrycan, I'm Torch... those were the days!"
languages.original_text: {n}Дэгген ухмыляется.{/n} "Когда-то меня звали Запальщик. Он — Канистра, я — Запальщик... хорошие были времена!"

languages.text: {n}达根憨笑了起来。{/n}“他们以前都管我叫‘火把’。他是油罐，我是火把……真是段好日子呵！”
languages.original_text: {n}Daggen smirks.{/n} "They used to call me Torch. He's Jerrycan, I'm Torch... those were the days!"

traits.locale_text: {n}达根憨笑了起来。{/n}“他们以前都管我叫‘火把’。他是油罐，我是火把……真是段好日子呵！”

languages.text: {n}Daggen sonríe.{/n} «Me llamaban Soplete. Bidones y Soplete... ¡los buenos tiempos!».
languages.original_text: {n}Daggen smirks.{/n} "They used to call me Torch. He's Jerrycan, I'm Torch... those were the days!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Daggen sonríe.{/n} «Me llamaban Soplete. Bidones y Soplete... ¡los buenos tiempos!».

languages.text: {n}ダゲンがニヤリと笑った。{/n}「昔は『たいまつ』と呼ばれてたんだ。奴はジェリカン、俺はたいまつ…懐かしい日々ですな」
languages.original_text: {n}Daggen smirks.{/n} "They used to call me Torch. He's Jerrycan, I'm Torch... those were the days!"

traits.locale_text: {n}ダゲンがニヤリと笑った。{/n}「昔は『たいまつ』と呼ばれてたんだ。奴はジェリカン、俺はたいまつ…懐かしい日々ですな」

languages.text: {n}Daggen grinst verschlagen.{/n} "Mein Spitzname war Fackel. Er Kanister, ich Fackel ... das waren Zeiten!"
languages.original_text: {n}Daggen smirks.{/n} "They used to call me Torch. He's Jerrycan, I'm Torch... those were the days!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Daggen grinst verschlagen.{/n} "Mein Spitzname war Fackel. Er Kanister, ich Fackel ... das waren Zeiten!"

languages.text: {n}Daggen s'autorise un rictus.{/n} « On m'appelait Torche. Lui, c'était Jerrycan et moi, Torche... C'était le bon vieux temps ! »
languages.original_text: {n}Daggen smirks.{/n} "They used to call me Torch. He's Jerrycan, I'm Torch... those were the days!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Daggen s'autorise un rictus.{/n} « On m'appelait Torche. Lui, c'était Jerrycan et moi, Torche... C'était le bon vieux temps ! »

languages.text: {n}Daggen sırıtıyor.{/n} "Bana Meşale derlerdi. O Bidon'du, ben de Meşale... Ah be, ne günlerdi!"
languages.original_text: {n}Daggen smirks.{/n} "They used to call me Torch. He's Jerrycan, I'm Torch... those were the days!"
